WAnalytics

public class WAnalytics

WAnalytics singleton class used to setup and manage tracking through the framework.

Variables
  • manager

    WAnalytics sharedInstance

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let manager = WAnalytics()
  • loggingEnabled

    Enable/Disable WAnalytics console logs

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var loggingEnabled: Bool = true
  • gaDefaultTracker

    Reference to Google Analytics defaultTracker, only made available through the ‘setupGA:accountID’ function.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public private(set) var gaDefaultTracker: GAITracker?

Setup functions
  • setupGA(_:)

    Use this function in your AppDelegate’s ‘application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:’ to setup Google Analtyics service.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func setupGA(accountID: String)

    Parameters

    accountID

    Application Tracking ID provided by GA; (i.e. ‘UA-54312694-31’)

Tracking functions
  • trackScreen(_:name:)

    Use this function to track any screen view events that are NOT already being tracked. Keep in my automated tracking is on by default and will track every viewDidAppear as a screen view if waID and waCateogry are provided.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func trackScreen(service:WAnalyticsService, name:String)

    Parameters

    service

    See WAnalyticsService
    name

    Name of the screen you want to track
  • trackEvent(_:properties:)

    Use this function to track any events that are NOT already being tracked. Keep in my automated tracking is on by default and will track every view along with all button clicks if waID and waCateogry are provided.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func trackEvent(service:WAnalyticsService, properties:WAnalyticsTrackingProperties)

    Parameters

    service

    See WAnaltyicsService.
    properties

    See WAnaltyicsTrackingProperties.
